para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The procedure to configure work load/unload is provided in the form of flow chart on the Fixture Setting screen.

li.text: Select a work load trigger type using the

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:100px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: If auto door exist, set whether to close the door before fixture clamp. (If the door is not bypassed, clamp operation cannot start id the door is open.)

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select whether each air sea check is enabled or not. (If air seat check does not exist, these settings are ignored.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select the check status of each air seat check. (If the seat check pass condition is “High”, set to On and if it is “Low”, set to Off.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Enter the stabilization time of the air seat check signals before a work seating warning or alarm is triggered.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select whether the fixture is to perform a seat retry operation if the air seat check fails. (The seat retry operation involves unclamping and clamping the fixture once to retry the seat check. If the seat check fails a second time, an alarm is triggered and the work load process stops.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select the 2nd work load (work start) trigger type using the

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:211px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:211px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

body.para: If “None” is selected, the work loading sequence skips this step and proceeds to the next step. If a selection is made, the work loading sequence stops here and waits for the selected trigger signal before proceeding.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:14px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:48px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:avoid; border:none; tabstops:57px left ;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;

text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Select whether to turn On fixture coolant. Alarm will be triggered if “YES” is selected and fixture coolant option does not exist.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: Input the On time of fixture coolant.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: If auto door exist, select whether to open the door before fixture unclamps. (If the door is not bypassed, unclamp operation cannot start if the door is open.)

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
li.text: If auto door exist, select whether to open the door after fixture unclamps.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-27px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:89px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:200px left ;
